name: Plan S - Organic Intermittent Fasting Muscle Builder

Meal 1 (Break Fast).details: Organic Protein-Packed Brunch: 3 organic eggs, 4 oz organic smoked salmon, 1/2 organic avocado, 1 cup organic spinach, 1 slice organic whole grain bread, 1 tbsp organic olive oil
Meal 1 (Break Fast).instructions: Scramble eggs with spinach. Serve with smoked salmon, avocado, and toasted bread drizzled with olive oil.

Post-Workout Shake.details: Organic Recovery Smoothie: 2 scoops organic whey protein powder, 1 organic banana, 1 cup organic berries, 1 tbsp organic almond butter, 1 cup organic almond milk, 1 tbsp organic chia seeds

Meal 2.details: Organic Chicken and Quinoa Bowl: 6 oz organic grilled chicken breast, 1 cup cooked organic quinoa, 1 cup organic roasted vegetables (broccoli, carrots, bell peppers), 2 tbsp organic hummus, 1 tbsp organic olive oil
Meal 2.instructions: Grill chicken. Roast vegetables. Serve over quinoa with a dollop of hummus and drizzle of olive oil.

Meal 3 (Last Meal).details: Organic Steak with Sweet Potato and Greens: 8 oz organic grass-fed steak, 1 medium organic sweet potato, 2 cups organic mixed greens, 1/4 organic avocado, 2 tbsp organic balsamic vinaigrette
Meal 3 (Last Meal).instructions: Grill steak. Bake sweet potato. Toss greens with vinaigrette and avocado. Serve together.
